meanings.definition: To bend the knee or touch one knee to the ground in reverence or worship.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the knight genuflects before the king.
meanings.sent2: Every Sunday, the churchgoer genuflects before entering the pew.
meanings.sent3: The penguin comically genuflects before diving into the icy water.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, the trees genuflect in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The old man genuflects to the memories of his youth.

meanings.sent1: Before the grand statue, the tourist genuflects in awe.
meanings.sent2: In the presence of the sacred relic, the pilgrim genuflects with reverence.
meanings.sent3: The cat humorously genuflects before pouncing on the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The mountains genuflect to the power of the roaring avalanche.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements genuflect to the rhythm of the music.

meanings.definition: She genuflects as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent1: Upon meeting the elder, the child genuflects politely.
meanings.sent2: At the traditional ceremony, the student genuflects gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The dog playfully genuflects before chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The flowers genuflect to the morning sunlight, opening their petals.
meanings.sent5: The wind genuflects to the power of the approaching storm.
